textBeforeTable: Releases Fixed check for Firebug menu entry in View menu Current annotation is added again when resetting the options Twisties are now vertically correctly displayed Tools menu in SeaMonkey is shown again Miscellaneous Search Field now resizes with the text size Search Field Cookies can now be removed after a page reload Cookies Panel JavaScript filter works for files with incorrect MIME type Firebug does not influence caching of XHRs of the same URL anymore Request body is shown for PATCH requests Fixed network requests stuck in progress when opening them in new tab Security column of cookies is now filled correctly Net Panel Fixed display of scripts in Location Menu when they contain special characters Changed directive for sourceURL to also allow //# sourceURL
textAfterTable: Firebug 1.11 This release is the current stable version. Overview Firebug Roadmap Firebug 1.11 announcement Firebug 1.11 Feature Highlights Features and changes Console and Command Line Enhanced $x() Event target is added to event logs Stack trace is shown for function call logs $() now uses querySelector() instead of getElementById() Root element can now be set for $() API for registering commands Auto-completion for built-in members Support for PerformanceTiming spec New Command Line API include() Completion List Popup is opened at start of expression window.postMessage() output is displayed Formatting of parts of console logs Added Closure Inspector HTML
